system.weapons: Fixed: Front Facing Rotary Power Cutters/Melta Cutters (Melee, 3d10+20 R, Pen 16, Concussive (2), Felling (4), Tearing, Unwieldy
system.specialRules:
Traits: Opened Topped, Ponderous, Reinforced Armour, Tracked Vehicle,

Special Trait: Burrower (6)

Special Rules: Can only Attack by the Ram! Action. However uses its Drill to determine Damage to the opponent, taking no damage itself. Has Burrower Trait, allowing it to move underground, leaving a semi-stable tunnel behind it that infantry can move through unhindered. Can attack from underground by digging up, suprising enemies.
